Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 54th overall pick, by Northeastern in 1975...
Injured on 8/23/1977 with a Sprained Ankle, out for 3 days...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1982, off Tom Meagher (Min)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/10/1982, off George Popovich (NJ)...
Drove in 7 runs against Bay City on 6/28/1985...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/19/1986, hitting .500 with 2 HR, 6 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/8/1986, hitting .563 with 1 HR, 5 RBI...
Was selected to the 1987 Allstar game...
Injured on 6/1/1988 with a Bruised Ulna, out for 1-2 weeks...
